Text: The Association has been and will continue to be highly involved in EU legislation, as demonstrated by the recent success in lowering capital requirements under Solvency II from 39% to 22% for insurers investing in equities, including listed real estate.
Cause: The Association has been and will continue to be highly involved in EU legislation
Effect: the recent success in lowering capital requirements under Solvency II from 39% to 22% for insurers investing in equities, including listed real estate.
Sentence: <e1>The Association has been and will continue to be highly involved in EU legislation</e1>, as demonstrated by <e2>the recent success in lowering capital requirements under Solvency II from 39% to 22% for insurers investing in equities, including listed real estate.</e2>
